schema.name: Please select the area of your activity
Please select the area of your activity

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	P_DWH_FILE_NAME as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		Course_name as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Location as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Country as string,
		Size as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcStageOLAC
SrcStageOLAC derive({Year of birth} = case({Year of birth}=='N/A', 
'',
iif(toInteger({Year of birth}) < year(currentUTC()), '', {Year of birth})
),
		NEW_DATALAKE_FILE = 'OLAC/'+replace($P_DWH_FILE_NAME, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		Course_name as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Location as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Country as string,
		Size as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'NEW_DATALAKE_FILE') ~> DWHOLAC

parameters{
	P_DWH_FILE_NAME as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of platform} as string,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		Email as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		City as string,
		Size as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcStageSheTrades
SrcStageSheTrades derive({Year of birth} = iif(toInteger({Year of birth}) < year(currentUTC()), '', {Year of birth}),
		NEW_DATALAKE_FILE = 'SHE_TRADES/'+replace($P_DWH_FILE_NAME, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of platform} as string,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		Email as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		City as string,
		Size as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'NEW_DATALAKE_FILE') ~> DWHSHETRADES

parameters{
	P_DWH_FILE_NAME as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Size as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		{Date of birth2} as string,
		{Country of Residence} as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Region as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcStageWEDF
SrcStageWEDF derive(Address = replace(Address, '\\n',' '),
		{Office Address} = replace({Office Address}, '\\n',' '),
		NEW_DATALAKE_FILE = 'WEDF/'+replace($P_DWH_FILE_NAME, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Size as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		{Date of birth2} as string,
		{Country of Residence} as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Region as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'NEW_DATALAKE_FILE') ~> DWHWEDF
